description:
######## 50% OFF ########
2.0.0: FIXED NOTIFICATION ISSUES. 
PLEASE UPDATE THE APP AND LEAVE THE REVIEW.
****************************

•	After the released the successful fitness appz like Pushups, Sqauts, and now we come up with Couch to 5K.
•	This app is perfect for the police test, walkers, joggers, runners, marathon training, running, jogging, fitness, exercise, weight loss, performance, interval trainers.
•	This application will help you to achieving nonstop 5km running.
•	This app also contains the 9 week schedule which will improve your ability to run 5 Km without stopping.
•	Alternate between intervals of jogging & walking in an increasingly challenging set of workouts.
•	No need to remember the schedule.
•	This app also contains alerts while changing the activity.
•	Each workout session is from 30-40 minutes long.
•	If you’re followed this schedule definitely gains strength using this application & performing the training program.
